title: Animation cancelling Renekton's Dominus?
body:
With the 5.9 Renekton buffs, I've found myself having a fun time on the Shuriman demigod. I learnt how to manage his fury for maximised trades, ability combinations for trade/teamfight potential and how to animation cancel his W with Tiamat/Hydra passive. All these things make me feel satisfied when I play Renekton, and make the enemy melee top laner sad.

However, I find myself constantly hampered when I activate Renekton's ultimate, because the ability requires a brief period to activate in which Renekton becomes stationary. This provides a window of opportunity to run away from (or turn and fight) Renekton that becomes an annoyance, especially when Slicing and Dicing onto the enemy carry. I believe Nasus also has this stationary period.

So my question: is there a way to animation cancel Renekton's ultimate, similar to Riven's Wind Slash, that allows the Gator to integrate his ultimate into his trade/engage patterns flawlessly and without pausing? It would allow Renekton's trades and engages to be a lot more dangerous if there is, and improve my playstyle.

replies.body: I believe I've seen Renektons in LCS and such use their W and Ult at the same time.
